name: Momonga Pinball Adventures
description: Momonga is a unique pinball game, where you bounce a flying squirrel through different levels. Enemies, boss fights, exploration - it has all the ingredients of good old action-adventure games, but with flippers!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Microsoft® Windows® 7 + Процессор: Intel Core 2 Duo 2 GHz + Оперативная память: 4 GB ОЗУ Видеокарта: Intel® HD Graphics 4000 + DirectX: Версии 9.0c Место на диске: 750 MB
